AssociateResourceShare.title: AssociateResourceShare
AssociateResourceShare.summary: Associates resources or principals with a resource share.

AssociateResourceSharePermission.title: AssociateResourceSharePermission
AssociateResourceSharePermission.summary: Associates permissions with a resource share.

ChangeResourceGroup.title: ChangeResourceGroup
ChangeResourceGroup.summary: Transfers a resource share from one resource group to another.

CheckSharingWithResourceDirectoryStatus.title: CheckSharingWithResourceDirectoryStatus
CheckSharingWithResourceDirectoryStatus.summary: Checks the status of resource sharing within a resource directory.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries the regions where the Resource Sharing service is available.

DisassociateResourceShare.title: DisassociateResourceShare
DisassociateResourceShare.summary: Disassociates resources or principals from a resource share.

DisassociateResourceSharePermission.title: DisassociateResourceSharePermission
DisassociateResourceSharePermission.summary: Disassociates a permission from a resource share. You can disassociate a permission from a resource share only if the resource share does not contain resources of the type indicated by the permission.

EnableSharingWithResourceDirectory.title: EnableSharingWithResourceDirectory
EnableSharingWithResourceDirectory.summary: Enables resource sharing for a resource directory.

GetPermission.title: GetPermission
GetPermission.summary: Queries the information about a permission.

ListPermissionVersions.title: ListPermissionVersions
ListPermissionVersions.summary: Queries the versions of a permission.

ListPermissions.title: ListPermissions
ListPermissions.summary: Queries the information about the default permission.

ListResourceShareAssociations.title: ListResourceShareAssociations
ListResourceShareAssociations.summary: Queries the association records of resource shares.

ListResourceShareInvitations.title: ListResourceShareInvitations
ListResourceShareInvitations.summary: Queries the resource sharing invitations that are received.

ListResourceSharePermissions.title: ListResourceSharePermissions
ListResourceSharePermissions.summary: Queries the permissions that are associated with a resource share.

ListSharedResources.title: ListSharedResources
ListSharedResources.summary: Queries the resources you share with other accounts or the resources other accounts share with you.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added to resource shares.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Adds tags to a resource share.

UpdateResourceShare.title: UpdateResourceShare
UpdateResourceShare.summary: Modifies the information of a resource share.
